    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectedTileInfoTable()
      Constructs the table that will identify selected tiles; their owners and their resident roboticons It will also prepare and deploy buttons to allow for players to claim those tiles or deploy/upgrade roboticons on them
